sources.title: Destruction Inc. (1942)
sources.description: Superman has to thwart wartime saboteurs tampering with things at the Metropolis Munitions Plant...who have captured Lois Lane and loaded her into a torpedo! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/destruction-inc-1942/

metadata.Plot: A murder at the Metropolis Munitions plant draws Lois Lane into the thick of a sabotage plot; she ends up inside a torpedo about to be tested. Meanwhile, where is Superman?
metadata.Director: Izzy Sparber, Dave Fleischer, Dave Tendlar
metadata.Writer: Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster, Jay Morton
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer
